title: Enacts school technology planning act requiring regional or district-wide technology planning by school districts
summary: Enacts school technology planning act requiring regional or district-wide technology planning by school districts; also assigns a role for the state education department to provide technical assistance to schools, review and approve district plans and to report to the governor and the legislature on planning and funding.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the school technology planning act
